text: @realDonaldTrump @newtgingrich @foxandfriends Turn the lights back on in the #WhiteHouse President Trump. Wake up over there! Get the looters & the rioters out of the streets. Get the cities cleaned back up & lets refocus on the #coronavirus & economy! Vandal protestors should be in paddy wagons! #WhiteHouseProtests
